name: VIR-151.05 Verify that the "Top" button is shown to the user on the Search result page

testSteps.description: Given open the site and login

children.description: Enter the value in the field with label: anthony.lombardi@rustic-hw.com, Email Address
Enter the value in the field with label: 12341234, Password
Search for product using search bar: table

testSteps.description: When scroll "down" page for the "70" percent

children.description: Scroll page for the percent: down, 70

testSteps.description: Then the Top button is shown

children.description: Verify that the back to top button is shown

userStory.narrative:
As a customer is scrolling down, show "Top" button
for user to click and anchor the customer back to the top of the page
